@graph.caption: square image of vegan potato salad in a bowl

@graph.name: Best Vegan Potato Salad - Nora Cooks
@graph.description: This is the best dang vegan potato salad, period. It's ultra creamy with a flavorful mayo-mustard-sweet pickle dressing, "eggy" tofu and dill!

@graph.name: Best Vegan Potato Salad
@graph.description: This is the best dang vegan potato salad, period. It's ultra creamy with a flavorful mayo-mustard-sweet pickle dressing, "eggy" tofu and fresh dill! No one would ever guess it's 100% vegan.
recipeIngredient: 5 pounds yukon gold potatoes, peeled and chopped small (1/2-1 inch)

itemListElement.text: Add the chopped potatoes to a large pot and cover them with water. Bring to a boil and cook for 10-15 minutes, until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork. Drain the potatoes in a colander.
itemListElement.name: Add the chopped potatoes to a large pot and cover them with water. Bring to a boil and cook for 10-15 minutes, until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork. Drain the potatoes in a colander.

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile, press the tofu by wrapping in paper towels (or a clean dry tea towel.) Place a plate or pan on top of the wrapped tofu, and put a couple of heavy books or cast iron pan on top of that. Let the tofu press for about 20 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile, press the tofu by wrapping in paper towels (or a clean dry tea towel.) Place a plate or pan on top of the wrapped tofu, and put a couple of heavy books or cast iron pan on top of that. Let the tofu press for about 20 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Once the tofu is pressed, slice the block into thin strips, then slice thinly the other way. Chop into even smaller pieces and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Once the tofu is pressed, slice the block into thin strips, then slice thinly the other way. Chop into even smaller pieces and set aside.

itemListElement.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together the vegan mayo, pickle relish, yellow mustard, apple cider vinegar, celery seeds and paprika. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: In a medium bowl, whisk together the vegan mayo, pickle relish, yellow mustard, apple cider vinegar, celery seeds and paprika. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Place the cooked and drained potatoes in a large bowl, while still warm. Add the chopped celery, green onions, dill, tofu and dressing to the potatoes, and stir gently to mix until the potatoes are coated. Add salt + pepper to taste.
itemListElement.name: Place the cooked and drained potatoes in a large bowl, while still warm. Add the chopped celery, green onions, dill, tofu and dressing to the potatoes, and stir gently to mix until the potatoes are coated. Add salt + pepper to taste.

itemListElement.text: Cover the potato salad and place in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours if possible before serving. Overnight is even better! It will keep for about 1 week in the refrigerator. Enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Cover the potato salad and place in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours if possible before serving. Overnight is even better! It will keep for about 1 week in the refrigerator. Enjoy!

@graph.keywords: eggless potato salad, vegan potato salad
